Texts.Chs: 水产养殖似乎是未来的潮流。通过改进传统的鲛人农业方法，我们已经能够增加约200%的营养酱产量。不用说，这对整个猿人社会来说将会有有趣的影响。
Texts.Eng: Aquaculture seems to be the wave of the future. By modifying traditional Hylotl agricultural practices, we have been able to increase nutrient paste output by approximately 200%. Needless to say, this has interesting ramifications for Apex society as a whole.

Texts.Chs: 鱼类、珊瑚和植物共同生长，以最少的废物和外界投入，创造了一个极好的封闭生态系统。节省空间，即使考虑标准的水培设置。我们有也信心，在两年的时间里，配给制的账面将成为过去，民众的最大阻力将被打破。
Texts.Eng: Fish, corals and vegetation work together to produce a superb closed ecosystem with minimal waste and outside inputs. Space is saved, even when one considers standard hydroponic setups. We are confident that in two years' time, ration books will be a thing of the past, breaking the greatest hold the resistance has on the populace.

Texts.Chs: 不过遗憾的是，我们还没能发明出一种可以安全浸入咸水中的香蕉品种，不过三角洲团队似乎已经取得了一些进展。在此期间，我建议增加‘我不敢相信这不是香蕉！’的发放来应对如今公民对于香蕉的渴望。
Texts.Eng: Our only regret is that we have yet to produce a banana variant that will tolerate submersion in brine, but Delta Team appears to be onto some promising results. In the meantime, we suggest increasing allotments of 'I can't believe it's not banana!' banana flavouring to mollify citizens.
